data.thought: S38|H|S36|Creative Phenotype G2: 'Algorithmic Music Composer'. Human describes mood/genre. Thoughtbox reasons about: music theory, harmony, rhythm patterns. Generates code for audio synthesis. Container produces audio. Observatory: waveform visualization, structure diagram, theory annotations. Iterative refinement. Novel: AI explains WHY musical choices work (theory + emotion). Use case: game soundtracks, ambient music, experimental composition.
